benchmark_details.name: InfoVisDial
benchmark_details.overview: InfoVisDial is a visual dialogue dataset that provides rich informative answers for each round, enabling long free-form responses while requiring external knowledge related to visual content.
benchmark_details.data_type: dialogue with scene text and external knowledge

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset for informative visual dialogue tasks that require understanding of scene text and external knowledge.

data.source: Images from the TextVQA dataset with generated dialogues using a combination of GPT-3 and human annotators for quality filtering and fact-checking.
data.annotation: Automatically generated dialogues with human filtering for quality.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on generated dialogue responses compared to ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in generating informative dialogues.
methodology.baseline_results: Fine-tuned GIT model results showed significant improvements compared to GPT-3 alone.
methodology.validation: Model evaluated through user studies and comparison with existing metrics.
